markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Instinctual Interception](/Feats.aspx?ID=3585) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 75

**Archetype** [Knight Vigilant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=27)

**Prerequisites**
[Knight Vigilant](/Feats.aspx?ID=1092); [Interrupt Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=3578)

</column>

---

You react to movement with hardly a thought, seeming constantly poised to spring. At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to Interrupt Charge.
name: Instinctual Interception
